snippet.title: [Nintendo 64DD] Kyojin no Doshin 2 Gameplay
snippet.description: http://64DD.net This video shows the gameplay of Doshin 2. First, you have to build a monument in Doshin 1. Then, start Doshin 2 and find the empty pavillon place corresponding to the monument you've build in Doshin 1. If done well, a pavillon will come out and Queen Companion will appear, asking you to do something in Doshin 1. After you did as she said in Doshin 1, restart Doshin 2 and if done well, she will let you watch a 30sec video of "More Than Giant".
